text: Albert Lawrence Brooks (born Albert Lawrence Einstein; July 22, 1947) is an American actor, comedian, director, and screenwriter. He is known for his roles in Modern Romance (1981), Lost in America (1985), Defending Your Life (1991), Finding Nemo (2003), The Simpsons Movie (2007), and Drive (2011).
